mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.evm.dao.AEPEVM001QMapper.selectAffMppList */
SELECT DISTINCT A1050.PRE_AFF_NO AS A1030 , A1030.AUD_YR AS A1030_AUD_YR , A1030.AUD_NO AS A1030_AUD_NO , A1030.EXPT_PRB_NM AS A1030_TITLE_NM , A1030.DOC_ID AS A1030_DOC_ID , A1030.AUD_STEP_CD AS A1030_AUD_STEP_CD , A1030.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A1030_RPRT_FILD_ID , A1030.EXPT_PRB_SNO AS A1030_EXPT_PRB_SNO , A1030.MPP_SEQ AS A1030_MPP_SEQ , A1050.AUD_YR AS A1050_AUD_YR , A1050.AUD_NO AS A1050_AUD_NO , A1050.AUD_STEP_CD AS A1050_AUD_STEP_CD , A1050.DOC_ID AS A1050_DOC_ID , A1050.APVR_CD AS A1050_APVR_CD , A1050.AFF_SNO AS A1050_AFF_SNO , A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A1050_DSP_RQ_SNO , A1050.MPP_SEQ AS A1050_MPP_SEQ , A1050.PRE_AFF_NO AS A1050_PRE_AFF_NO , A1050.AFF_NO AS A1050 , A1050.TITLE_NM AS A1050_TITLE_NM , A1050.DSP_RQ_NM AS A1050_DSP_RQ_NM , A1050.DSP_RQ_CD AS A1050_DSP_RQ_CD , A1050.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A1050_RPRT_FILD_ID , A1050.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A1050_RLTN_ORG_NM , A1050.REFER_YN AS A1050_REFER_YN , A1050.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A1050_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_EXPT_MPP(A1030.AUD_YR, A1030.AUD_NO, A1030.AUD_STEP_CD, A1030.EXPT_PRB_SNO) AS A1030_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A1050.AUD_YR, A1050.AUD_NO, A1050.AUD_STEP_CD, A1050.APVR_CD, A1050.AFF_SNO, A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO, A1050.MPP_SEQ) AS A1050_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A1050.AUD_YR, A1050.AUD_NO, A1050.AUD_STEP_CD, A1050.APVR_CD, A1050.AFF_SNO, A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO, A1050.MPP_SEQ) AS A1050_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A1050.AUD_YR, A1050.AUD_NO, A1050.AUD_STEP_CD, A1050.APVR_CD, A1050.AFF_SNO, A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO, A1050.MPP_SEQ) AS A1050_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A1050.AUD_YR, A1050.AUD_NO, A1050.AUD_STEP_CD, A1050.APVR_CD, A1050.AFF_SNO, A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO, A1050.MPP_SEQ, A10601.AFF_NO) AS A1050_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A1050.AUD_YR, A1050.AUD_NO, A1050.AUD_STEP_CD, A1050.APVR_CD, A1050.AFF_SNO, A1050.DSP_RQ_SNO, A1050.MPP_SEQ, A10601.AFF_NO) AS A1050_CHECK_D30
, A10601.AUD_YR AS A10601_AUD_YR , A10601.AUD_NO AS A10601_AUD_NO , A10601.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10601_AUD_STEP_CD , A10601.DOC_ID AS A10601_DOC_ID , A10601.APVR_CD AS A10601_APVR_CD , A10601.AFF_SNO AS A10601_AFF_SNO , A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10601_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10601.MPP_SEQ AS A10601_MPP_SEQ , A10601.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10601_PRE_AFF_NO , A10601.AFF_NO AS A10601 , A10601.TITLE_NM AS A10601_TITLE_NM , A10601.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10601_DSP_RQ_NM , A10601.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10601_DSP_RQ_CD , A10601.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10601_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10601.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10601_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10601.REFER_YN AS A10601_REFER_YN , A10601.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10601_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10601.AUD_YR, A10601.AUD_NO, A10601.AUD_STEP_CD, A10601.APVR_CD, A10601.AFF_SNO, A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10601.MPP_SEQ) AS A10601_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10601.AUD_YR, A10601.AUD_NO, A10601.AUD_STEP_CD, A10601.APVR_CD, A10601.AFF_SNO, A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10601.MPP_SEQ) AS A10601_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10601.AUD_YR, A10601.AUD_NO, A10601.AUD_STEP_CD, A10601.APVR_CD, A10601.AFF_SNO, A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10601.MPP_SEQ) AS A10601_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10601.AUD_YR, A10601.AUD_NO, A10601.AUD_STEP_CD, A10601.APVR_CD, A10601.AFF_SNO, A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10601.MPP_SEQ, A10602.AFF_NO) AS A10601_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10601.AUD_YR, A10601.AUD_NO, A10601.AUD_STEP_CD, A10601.APVR_CD, A10601.AFF_SNO, A10601.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10601.MPP_SEQ, A10602.AFF_NO) AS A10601_CHECK_D30
, A10602.AUD_YR AS A10602_AUD_YR , A10602.AUD_NO AS A10602_AUD_NO , A10602.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10602_AUD_STEP_CD , A10602.DOC_ID AS A10602_DOC_ID , A10602.APVR_CD AS A10602_APVR_CD , A10602.AFF_SNO AS A10602_AFF_SNO , A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10602_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10602.MPP_SEQ AS A10602_MPP_SEQ , A10602.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10602_PRE_AFF_NO , A10602.AFF_NO AS A10602 , A10602.TITLE_NM AS A10602_TITLE_NM , A10602.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10602_DSP_RQ_NM , A10602.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10602_DSP_RQ_CD , A10602.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10602_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10602.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10602_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10602.REFER_YN AS A10602_REFER_YN , A10602.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10602_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10602.AUD_YR, A10602.AUD_NO, A10602.AUD_STEP_CD, A10602.APVR_CD, A10602.AFF_SNO, A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10602.MPP_SEQ) AS A10602_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10602.AUD_YR, A10602.AUD_NO, A10602.AUD_STEP_CD, A10602.APVR_CD, A10602.AFF_SNO, A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10602.MPP_SEQ) AS A10602_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10602.AUD_YR, A10602.AUD_NO, A10602.AUD_STEP_CD, A10602.APVR_CD, A10602.AFF_SNO, A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10602.MPP_SEQ) AS A10602_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10602.AUD_YR, A10602.AUD_NO, A10602.AUD_STEP_CD, A10602.APVR_CD, A10602.AFF_SNO, A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10602.MPP_SEQ, A10603.AFF_NO) AS A10602_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10602.AUD_YR, A10602.AUD_NO, A10602.AUD_STEP_CD, A10602.APVR_CD, A10602.AFF_SNO, A10602.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10602.MPP_SEQ, A10603.AFF_NO) AS A10602_CHECK_D30
, A10603.AUD_YR AS A10603_AUD_YR , A10603.AUD_NO AS A10603_AUD_NO , A10603.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10603_AUD_STEP_CD , A10603.DOC_ID AS A10603_DOC_ID , A10603.APVR_CD AS A10603_APVR_CD , A10603.AFF_SNO AS A10603_AFF_SNO , A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10603_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10603.MPP_SEQ AS A10603_MPP_SEQ , A10603.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10603_PRE_AFF_NO , A10603.AFF_NO AS A10603 , A10603.TITLE_NM AS A10603_TITLE_NM , A10603.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10603_DSP_RQ_NM , A10603.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10603_DSP_RQ_CD , A10603.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10603_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10603.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10603_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10603.REFER_YN AS A10603_REFER_YN , A10603.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10603_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10603.AUD_YR, A10603.AUD_NO, A10603.AUD_STEP_CD, A10603.APVR_CD, A10603.AFF_SNO, A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10603.MPP_SEQ) AS A10603_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10603.AUD_YR, A10603.AUD_NO, A10603.AUD_STEP_CD, A10603.APVR_CD, A10603.AFF_SNO, A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10603.MPP_SEQ) AS A10603_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10603.AUD_YR, A10603.AUD_NO, A10603.AUD_STEP_CD, A10603.APVR_CD, A10603.AFF_SNO, A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10603.MPP_SEQ) AS A10603_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10603.AUD_YR, A10603.AUD_NO, A10603.AUD_STEP_CD, A10603.APVR_CD, A10603.AFF_SNO, A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10603.MPP_SEQ, A10604.AFF_NO) AS A10603_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10603.AUD_YR, A10603.AUD_NO, A10603.AUD_STEP_CD, A10603.APVR_CD, A10603.AFF_SNO, A10603.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10603.MPP_SEQ, A10604.AFF_NO) AS A10603_CHECK_D30
, A10604.AUD_YR AS A10604_AUD_YR , A10604.AUD_NO AS A10604_AUD_NO , A10604.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10604_AUD_STEP_CD , A10604.DOC_ID AS A10604_DOC_ID , A10604.APVR_CD AS A10604_APVR_CD , A10604.AFF_SNO AS A10604_AFF_SNO , A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10604_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10604.MPP_SEQ AS A10604_MPP_SEQ , A10604.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10604_PRE_AFF_NO , A10604.AFF_NO AS A10604 , A10604.TITLE_NM AS A10604_TITLE_NM , A10604.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10604_DSP_RQ_NM , A10604.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10604_DSP_RQ_CD , A10604.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10604_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10604.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10604_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10604.REFER_YN AS A10604_REFER_YN , A10604.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10604_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10604.AUD_YR, A10604.AUD_NO, A10604.AUD_STEP_CD, A10604.APVR_CD, A10604.AFF_SNO, A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10604.MPP_SEQ) AS A10604_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10604.AUD_YR, A10604.AUD_NO, A10604.AUD_STEP_CD, A10604.APVR_CD, A10604.AFF_SNO, A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10604.MPP_SEQ) AS A10604_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10604.AUD_YR, A10604.AUD_NO, A10604.AUD_STEP_CD, A10604.APVR_CD, A10604.AFF_SNO, A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10604.MPP_SEQ) AS A10604_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10604.AUD_YR, A10604.AUD_NO, A10604.AUD_STEP_CD, A10604.APVR_CD, A10604.AFF_SNO, A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10604.MPP_SEQ, A10701.AFF_NO) AS A10604_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10604.AUD_YR, A10604.AUD_NO, A10604.AUD_STEP_CD, A10604.APVR_CD, A10604.AFF_SNO, A10604.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10604.MPP_SEQ, A10701.AFF_NO) AS A10604_CHECK_D30
, A10701.AUD_YR AS A10701_AUD_YR , A10701.AUD_NO AS A10701_AUD_NO , A10701.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10701_AUD_STEP_CD , A10701.DOC_ID AS A10701_DOC_ID , A10701.APVR_CD AS A10701_APVR_CD , A10701.AFF_SNO AS A10701_AFF_SNO , A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10701_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10701.MPP_SEQ AS A10701_MPP_SEQ , A10701.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10701_PRE_AFF_NO , A10701.AFF_NO AS A10701 , A10701.TITLE_NM AS A10701_TITLE_NM , A10701.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10701_DSP_RQ_NM , A10701.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10701_DSP_RQ_CD , A10701.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10701_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10701.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10701_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10701.REFER_YN AS A10701_REFER_YN , A10701.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10701_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10701.AUD_YR, A10701.AUD_NO, A10701.AUD_STEP_CD, A10701.APVR_CD, A10701.AFF_SNO, A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10701.MPP_SEQ) AS A10701_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10701.AUD_YR, A10701.AUD_NO, A10701.AUD_STEP_CD, A10701.APVR_CD, A10701.AFF_SNO, A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10701.MPP_SEQ) AS A10701_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10701.AUD_YR, A10701.AUD_NO, A10701.AUD_STEP_CD, A10701.APVR_CD, A10701.AFF_SNO, A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10701.MPP_SEQ) AS A10701_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10701.AUD_YR, A10701.AUD_NO, A10701.AUD_STEP_CD, A10701.APVR_CD, A10701.AFF_SNO, A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10701.MPP_SEQ, A10702.AFF_NO) AS A10701_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10701.AUD_YR, A10701.AUD_NO, A10701.AUD_STEP_CD, A10701.APVR_CD, A10701.AFF_SNO, A10701.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10701.MPP_SEQ, A10702.AFF_NO) AS A10701_CHECK_D30
, A10702.AUD_YR AS A10702_AUD_YR , A10702.AUD_NO AS A10702_AUD_NO , A10702.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10702_AUD_STEP_CD , A10702.DOC_ID AS A10702_DOC_ID , A10702.APVR_CD AS A10702_APVR_CD , A10702.AFF_SNO AS A10702_AFF_SNO , A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10702_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10702.MPP_SEQ AS A10702_MPP_SEQ , A10702.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10702_PRE_AFF_NO , A10702.AFF_NO AS A10702 , A10702.TITLE_NM AS A10702_TITLE_NM , A10702.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10702_DSP_RQ_NM , A10702.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10702_DSP_RQ_CD , A10702.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10702_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10702.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10702_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10702.REFER_YN AS A10702_REFER_YN , A10702.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10702_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10702.AUD_YR, A10702.AUD_NO, A10702.AUD_STEP_CD, A10702.APVR_CD, A10702.AFF_SNO, A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10702.MPP_SEQ) AS A10702_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10702.AUD_YR, A10702.AUD_NO, A10702.AUD_STEP_CD, A10702.APVR_CD, A10702.AFF_SNO, A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10702.MPP_SEQ) AS A10702_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10702.AUD_YR, A10702.AUD_NO, A10702.AUD_STEP_CD, A10702.APVR_CD, A10702.AFF_SNO, A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10702.MPP_SEQ) AS A10702_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10702.AUD_YR, A10702.AUD_NO, A10702.AUD_STEP_CD, A10702.APVR_CD, A10702.AFF_SNO, A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10702.MPP_SEQ, A10703.AFF_NO) AS A10702_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10702.AUD_YR, A10702.AUD_NO, A10702.AUD_STEP_CD, A10702.APVR_CD, A10702.AFF_SNO, A10702.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10702.MPP_SEQ, A10703.AFF_NO) AS A10702_CHECK_D30
, A10703.AUD_YR AS A10703_AUD_YR , A10703.AUD_NO AS A10703_AUD_NO , A10703.AUD_STEP_CD AS A10703_AUD_STEP_CD , A10703.DOC_ID AS A10703_DOC_ID , A10703.APVR_CD AS A10703_APVR_CD , A10703.AFF_SNO AS A10703_AFF_SNO , A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO AS A10703_DSP_RQ_SNO , A10703.MPP_SEQ AS A10703_MPP_SEQ , A10703.PRE_AFF_NO AS A10703_PRE_AFF_NO , A10703.AFF_NO AS A10703 , A10703.TITLE_NM AS A10703_TITLE_NM , A10703.DSP_RQ_NM AS A10703_DSP_RQ_NM , A10703.DSP_RQ_CD AS A10703_DSP_RQ_CD , A10703.RPRT_FILD_ID AS A10703_RPRT_FILD_ID , A10703.RLTN_ORG_NM AS A10703_RLTN_ORG_NM , A10703.REFER_YN AS A10703_REFER_YN , A10703.REFER_DVSN_CD AS A10703_REFER_DVSN_CD
, PKG_MPP.F_PRE_MPP(A10703.AUD_YR, A10703.AUD_NO, A10703.AUD_STEP_CD, A10703.APVR_CD, A10703.AFF_SNO, A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10703.MPP_SEQ) AS A10703_PRE_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_AFF_MPP(A10703.AUD_YR, A10703.AUD_NO, A10703.AUD_STEP_CD, A10703.APVR_CD, A10703.AFF_SNO, A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10703.MPP_SEQ) AS A10703_AFF_MPP , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_TYPE_CHG(A10703.AUD_YR, A10703.AUD_NO, A10703.AUD_STEP_CD, A10703.APVR_CD, A10703.AFF_SNO, A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10703.MPP_SEQ) AS A10703_MID_MPP1 , PKG_MPP.F_MID_MPP_D30_D40(A10703.AUD_YR, A10703.AUD_NO, A10703.AUD_STEP_CD, A10703.APVR_CD, A10703.AFF_SNO, A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10703.MPP_SEQ, '') AS A10703_MID_MPP2 , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_D30(A10703.AUD_YR, A10703.AUD_NO, A10703.AUD_STEP_CD, A10703.APVR_CD, A10703.AFF_SNO, A10703.DSP_RQ_SNO, A10703.MPP_SEQ, '') AS A10703_CHECK_D30
FROM ( SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , BB.AUD_STEP_CD , BB.EXPT_PRB_SNO , BB.EXPT_PRB_CD , BB.EXPT_PRB_NM , BB.DOC_ID , BB.RPRT_FILD_ID , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , AA.AFF_NO , AA.MPP_SEQ FROM TBBADDED147M AA , TBBADDED144M BB WHERE 1=1 AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD IN ('A1030', 'A1050') AND AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_YR = BB.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = BB.AUD_NO AND AA.PRE_AFF_NO = F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || BB.EXPT_PRB_CD ) AS A1030 FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , CC.DOC_ID , AA.APVR_CD , BB.AFF_SNO , CC.DSP_RQ_SNO , AA.MPP_SEQ , 0 AS AFF_DVSN_SEQ , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , AA.AFF_NO , BB.TITLE_NM , '' AS AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD , F_CODE_NM('1000002', CC.DSP_RQ_CD) AS DSP_RQ_NM , CC.DSP_RQ_CD , CC.RPRT_FILD_ID , F_ORG_INFO(CC.RLTN_ORG_CD, 1) AS RLTN_ORG_NM , DECODE(BB.REFER_DVSN_CD, 'E10', 'N', 'Y') AS REFER_YN , BB.REFER_DVSN_CD FROM TBBADDED147M AA , TBBADDED145M BB , TBBADDED146M CC WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1050' AND AA.AUD_YR = BB.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_YR = CC.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = BB.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_NO = CC.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = BB.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = CC.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = BB.APVR_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = CC.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = BB.AFF_SNO AND AA.AFF_SNO = CC.AFF_SNO AND AA.DSP_RQ_SNO = CC.DSP_RQ_SNO UNION ALL SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , AA.DOC_ID , AA.APVR_CD , AA.AFF_SNO , AA.DSP_RQ_SNO , AA.MPP_SEQ , DD.AFF_DVSN_SEQ , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , '' AS AFF_NO , '' AS TITLE_NM , DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD , '' AS DSP_RQ_NM , '' AS DSP_RQ_CD , '' AS RPRT_FILD_ID , '' AS RLTN_ORG_NM , '' AS REFER_YN , '' AS REFER_DVSN_CD FROM TBBADDED147M AA LEFT OUTER JOIN TBBADDED148M DD ON AA.AUD_YR = DD.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = DD.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = DD.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = DD.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = DD.AFF_SNO AND AA.DSP_RQ_SNO = DD.DSP_RQ_SNO AND AA.MPP_SEQ = DD.MPP_SEQ WHERE AA.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1050' AND AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD IN ( 'A90', 'A99' ) GROUP BY AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_STEP_CD, AA.DOC_ID, AA.APVR_CD, AA.AFF_SNO, AA.DSP_RQ_SNO, AA.MPP_SEQ, DD.AFF_DVSN_SEQ, AA.PRE_AFF_NO, DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD UNION ALL SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , AA.DOC_ID , AA.APVR_CD , AA.AFF_SNO , AA.DSP_RQ_SNO , AA.MPP_SEQ , 0 AS AFF_DVSN_SEQ , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , '' AS AFF_NO , '' AS TITLE_NM , '' AS AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD , '' AS DSP_RQ_NM , '' AS DSP_RQ_CD , '' AS RPRT_FILD_ID , '' AS RLTN_ORG_NM , '' AS REFER_YN , '' AS AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1030' AND AA.PRE_AFF_NO IN ( SELECT F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AUD_YR, AUD_NO, AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || EXPT_PRB_CD AS PRE_AFF_NO FROM TBBADDED144M WHERE 1=1 AND AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD, AA.DOC_ID, AA.APVR_CD, AA.AFF_SNO, AA.DSP_RQ_SNO, AA.MPP_SEQ, AA.PRE_AFF_NO) AS A1050 ON A1030.AFF_NO = A1050.PRE_AFF_NO

FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , CC.DOC_ID , AA.APVR_CD , BB.AFF_SNO , CC.DSP_RQ_SNO , AA.MPP_SEQ , 0 AS AFF_DVSN_SEQ , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , AA.AFF_NO , BB.TITLE_NM , '' AS AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD , F_CODE_NM('1000002', CC.DSP_RQ_CD) AS DSP_RQ_NM , CC.DSP_RQ_CD , CC.RPRT_FILD_ID , F_ORG_INFO(CC.RLTN_ORG_CD, 1) AS RLTN_ORG_NM , DECODE(BB.REFER_DVSN_CD, 'E10', 'N', 'Y') AS REFER_YN , BB.REFER_DVSN_CD FROM TBBADDED147M AA , TBBADDED145M BB , TBBADDED146M CC WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1070' AND AA.APVR_CD = 'A1070' AND AA.AUD_YR = BB.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_YR = CC.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = BB.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_NO = CC.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = BB.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = CC.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = BB.APVR_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = CC.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = BB.AFF_SNO AND AA.AFF_SNO = CC.AFF_SNO AND AA.DSP_RQ_SNO = CC.DSP_RQ_SNO UNION ALL SELECT AA.AUD_YR , AA.AUD_NO , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , AA.DOC_ID , AA.APVR_CD , AA.AFF_SNO , AA.DSP_RQ_SNO , AA.MPP_SEQ , DD.AFF_DVSN_SEQ , AA.PRE_AFF_NO , '' AS AFF_NO , '' AS TITLE_NM , DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD , '' AS DSP_RQ_NM , '' AS DSP_RQ_CD , '' AS RPRT_FILD_ID , '' AS RLTN_ORG_NM , '' AS REFER_YN , '' AS REFER_DVSN_CD FROM TBBADDED147M AA LEFT OUTER JOIN TBBADDED148M DD ON AA.AUD_YR = DD.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = DD.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = DD.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = DD.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = DD.AFF_SNO AND AA.DSP_RQ_SNO = DD.DSP_RQ_SNO AND AA.MPP_SEQ = DD.MPP_SEQ WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1070' AND AA.APVR_CD = 'A1070' AND DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD IN ( 'D90', 'D99', 'D70', 'D80' ) GROUP BY AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_STEP_CD, AA.DOC_ID, AA.APVR_CD, AA.AFF_SNO, AA.DSP_RQ_SNO, AA.MPP_SEQ, DD.AFF_DVSN_SEQ, AA.PRE_AFF_NO, DD.AFF_MPP_DVSN_CD) AS A10703 ON A10702.AFF_NO = A10703.PRE_AFF_NO
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A1030 , A1050 , A10601 , A10602 , A10603 , A10604 , A10701 , A10702 , A10703

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.evm.dao.AEPEVM001QMapper.selectNotMppList */ SELECT AFF_NO , TITLE_NM , AUD_STEP_CD , APVR_CD , AFF_SORT_SNO , DSP_SORT_SNO , DSP_RQ_NM FROM ( SELECT F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || AA.EXPT_PRB_CD AS AFF_NO , AA.EXPT_PRB_NM AS TITLE_NM , 'A1030' AS AUD_STEP_CD , '0010200' AS APVR_CD , AA.SORT_SNO AS AFF_SORT_SNO , 1 AS DSP_SORT_SNO , '' AS DSP_RQ_NM FROM TBBADDED144M AA WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBBADDED147M ZZ WHERE AA.AUD_YR = ZZ.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = ZZ.AUD_NO AND ZZ.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1050' AND ZZ.PRE_AFF_NO = F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || AA.EXPT_PRB_CD ) UNION ALL SELECT F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || AA.AFF_CD || '-' || BB.AFF_DSP_CD AS AFF_NO , AA.TITLE_NM , AA.AUD_STEP_CD , AA.APVR_CD , AA.SORT_SNO AS AFF_SORT_SNO , BB.SORT_SNO AS DSP_SORT_SNO , F_CODE_NM('1000002', BB.DSP_RQ_CD) AS DSP_RQ_NM FROM TBBADDED145M AA , TBBADDED146M BB WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_YR = BB.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = BB.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = BB.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = BB.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = BB.AFF_SNO AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBBADDED147M ZZ WHERE AA.AUD_YR = ZZ.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = ZZ.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = ZZ.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = ZZ.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = ZZ.AFF_SNO AND BB.DSP_RQ_SNO = ZZ.DSP_RQ_SNO ) ) ORDER BY AUD_STEP_CD, APVR_CD DESC, AFF_SORT_SNO, DSP_SORT_SNO

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.evm.dao.AEPEVM001QMapper.selectNotMppCnt */ SELECT MAX(COUNT(1)) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT 'A1030' AS AUD_STEP_CD , '0010200' AS APVR_CD FROM TBBADDED144M AA WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBBADDED147M ZZ WHERE AA.AUD_YR = ZZ.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = ZZ.AUD_NO AND ZZ.AUD_STEP_CD = 'A1050' AND ZZ.PRE_AFF_NO = F_MNG_KND_AUDYRNO(AA.AUD_YR, AA.AUD_NO, AA.AUD_KND_CD, '-') || '-' || AA.EXPT_PRB_CD ) UNION ALL SELECT AA.AUD_STEP_CD , AA.APVR_CD FROM TBBADDED145M AA , TBBADDED146M BB WHERE AA.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AA.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND AA.AUD_YR = BB.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = BB.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = BB.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = BB.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = BB.AFF_SNO AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBBADDED147M ZZ WHERE AA.AUD_YR = ZZ.AUD_YR AND AA.AUD_NO = ZZ.AUD_NO AND AA.AUD_STEP_CD = ZZ.AUD_STEP_CD AND AA.APVR_CD = ZZ.APVR_CD AND AA.AFF_SNO = ZZ.AFF_SNO AND BB.DSP_RQ_SNO = ZZ.DSP_RQ_SNO ) ) GROUP BY AUD_STEP_CD, APVR_CD

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.evm.dao.AEPEVM001QMapper.getDocType */ SELECT PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_DOC_ID(#{audYr}, #{audNo}, #{docId}, '1') AS DOC_ID , PKG_MPP.F_CHECK_DOC_ID(#{audYr}, #{audNo}, #{docId}, '2') AS DOC_TYPE FROM DUAL
